before being taken to centers across

but it is proving tricky at times the
life here is no good where I was in the

again stones were thrown fires lit and
the police responded with smoke grenades
the French authorities have had enough
of migrants trying to get on lorries
bound for Britain but some do not want

best chance of getting to the UK there

probably
the bulldozers could start ripping the
